thread.title: Brangelina have issues in their marriage
thread.title_full: Brangelina have issues in their marriage

title: Brangelina have issues in their marriage
text:
'Brangelina' have issues in their marriage 
Entertainment Industry News.Net (ANI) : Saturday 17th October, 2015 
Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt are the most ideal couple to every person who falls in love, but like any other love relationship, they do also have their personal issues and the actress admitted the same in a recent Vogue interview. 
The 'Maleficent' star said while discussing about their upcoming flick 'By The Sea' that the movie wasn't an autobiographical and if the characters were even remotely close to their problems they couldn't have made the film, News.com.au reported. 
The 40-year-old actress explained that they wouldn't have done so because as artists they wanted something that took them out of their comfort zones and it's not good in just being raw actors. 
Interestingly, 'By The Sea' marks the first time Jolie and Pitt have appeared in a movie together since 2005, when they fell in love on set of 'Mr. 
Mrs. Smith'. (ANI)
